dataIdInfo.idAbs: The Sinousity by Stream Segment tool calculates sinuosity for each line segment feature in a polyline feature layer. Can use shapefiles or geodatabase feature classes.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Kelly Whitehead, Jesse Langdon, South Fork Research, Inc.

tool.name: SinuosityTool

param.name: InputFCCenterline
param.displayname: Input stream network or centerline polyline feature class
param.dialogReference: Segmented stream network, line network, or centerline for calculating sinuosity. Sinuosity is calculated for each line feature.

param.name: OutputFCCenterline
param.displayname: Output polyline feature class with sinousity
param.dialogReference: Polyline feature class which includes sinousity values in a new attribute field.

param.name: scratchWorkspace
param.dialogReference:
• The scratch workspace can be a folder or geodatabase.

  • If a workspace is not designated, the tool will use the "in_memory" workspace. Temporarly files will not be accessible, but processing speeds will likely be reduced.

tool.summary: The Sinousity by Stream Segment tool calculates sinuosity for each line segment feature in a polyline feature layer. Can use shapefiles or geodatabase feature classes.
